member.param: The OAuth 2.0 scope for which to get an access token
Specify to force the generation of a new access token

member.name: T:UiPath.Activities.Api.Base.IDotnetRuntime
member.summary: For starting exes that intend to use the .NET runtime that is delivered with Robot/Studio.

member.name: P:UiPath.Activities.Api.Base.IDotnetRuntime.EnvironmentVariables
member.summary: Returns the Environment Variables that are to be used to start a .NET process with delivered .NET runtime. Note: returns empty dictionary when .NET runtime is not present in the Robot/Studio installation.

member.summary: Adds to Note: No-Op when .NET runtime is not present in the Robot/Studio installation.

member.name: P:UiPath.Activities.Api.Base.IDotnetRuntime.DotnetCliPath
member.summary: Returns full path to dotnet CLI when .NET runtime is present in the Robot/Studio installation and "dotnet" otherwise.
